title: Renewed push: Centre weighs dedicated fund to drive vehicle scrapping and new car sales
description: The government is exploring the idea of setting up a fund to encourage new vehicle purchases and promote the scrapping of old vehicles. Challenges such as lack of implementation, awareness, and facilities are impeding the success of the vehicle scrappage program.
